response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at $14,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise, aiming to be fair while ensuring a reasonable return on my investment.
